Service Details: - Promotes the interests of those residents who reside within the Glenmore Valley area- Organizes and promotes functions and activities for residents- Effect dialogue and interaction with officials (elected and staff) from the City of Kelowna and other levels of government on matters affecting the quality of life of Glenmore Valley residents, that include such issues as land use, housing, transportation, community facilities, parks, walkways, transit, air and water quality, etc.- Raises funds through membership fees, donations, gifts, grants, projects and other means in order that the association may meet its purposes and obligations
